verbs.description: [ARG0: Vice President Mike Pence] [V: got] [ARG1: an earful] [ARG2: from about 1,000 protesters in Philadelphia] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday evening] [ARGM-TMP: as he campaigned for Scott Wagner , the Republican Pennsylvania gubernatorial nominee , at a private fundraiser] , KYW - TV reported . What happened ? The angry , vocal crowd blasted Pence and President Donald Trump over the decision to prosecute all illegal border crossers , which has forced the separation of children from their parents per federal law and longstanding Department of Homeland Security policy . The protesters chanted , marched and arranged children ’s shoes on the ground to spell the word “ no , ” representing children separated from their families , across the street from the Rittenhouse Hotel where Pence spoke for about an hour at the event benefiting the Republican Governors Association , KYW said . “ I think it 's an awful , awful thing ... there 's just absolutely no reason for it ... it ca n’t be justified in any way possibly , ” Carolyn Cohen told the station . “ It ’s awful to see and hear these …
